mapper.select: select distinct LOCK_USER_2,id from t_identity_info ORDER by LOCK_USER_2

select t2.person_id_num, t2.person_name, t2.score_value, case when t1.sex = 1 then '男' when t1.sex = 2 then '女' end SEX, t1.accept_address, t1.LUOHU_NUMBER, tof.name registration, tr.name areaname, tm.address, tm.witness, tm.witness_phone, tm.witness_address, tp.operator, tp.operator_mobile, tp.operator2, tp.operator_obile2, th.self_phone, th.company_phone from t_identity_info t1, ( select PERSON_NAME,PERSON_ID_NUM,SCORE_VALUE from t_pb_score_result where batch_id=#{item.batchId} ) t2, t_house_move tm, t_office tof, t_region tr, t_company_info tp, t_house_other th where /*t1.id_number = t2.person_id_num 2019年6月17日，优化sql 语句，添加upper函数，改变筛选条件*/ upper(t1.id_number) = upper(t2.person_id_num) AND t1.CANCEL_STATUS=0 /*and t1.hall_status = 6*/ and t1.BATCH_ID = #{item.batchId} and t1.id = tm.identity_info_id and tm.registered_region = tof.id and tm.region = tr.id and t1.company_id = tp.id and t1.id = th.identity_info_id order by t2.score_value desc

select t2.person_id_num, t1.id, t2.person_name, t2.score_value, case when t1.sex = '1' then '男' when t1.sex = '2' then '女' else '其他' end sex, t1.age 年龄, t1.region_name 拟落户地区, t1.hall_status 预约大厅状态, case when t1.cancel_status = 0 then '正常' when t1.cancel_status = 1 then '取消资格' else '其他' end 资格取消状态, t1.RENSHE_ACCEPT_STATUS from t_identity_info t1, ( select PERSON_NAME,PERSON_ID_NUM,SCORE_VALUE from t_pb_score_result where batch_id=#{item.batchId} ) t2 where upper(t1.id_number) = upper(t2.person_id_num) and t1.batch_id = #{item.batchId} order by t2.score_value desc

select ACCEPT_NUMBER, name, id_number, CANCELREASON, TOREVIEWTIME, ISTOREVIEW from t_identity_info where batch_id = 1040 and TOREVIEWTIME is not null and ISTOREVIEW in (1, 2)
and i.accept_address_id = #{item.acceptAddressId}
